# Core Rule 4 - No sexual or shock content and references [color=SlateGray][italic]Revision A, 2025-10-11[/italic][/color]
This is a zero-tolerance rule.
Erotic roleplay (ERP) and sexual language are prohibited.
SS14 includes shocking themes such as gore, drug abuse, and suicide. Do not shock players by adding more details than necessary within context of in-game mechanics and physiology.
## Examples [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Using common insults such as "asshole," "shit," and "motherfucker." - Using common emotes such as "[italic]claps,[/italic]" "[italic]flips you off,[/italic]" and "[italic]blows a raspberry.[/italic]" - Describing or perpetrating violence, gore, suicide, and drug abuse.
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Speaking or acting sexually in any context. - Referencing genitalia, reproductive acts, or toiletry acts. - Describing or perpetrating violence, gore, suicide, and drug abuse with more detail than possible in-game.
